website_summaries.verdict: Owners of trucks and RVs will appreciate the additional length of the valve stem, especially when attempting to access dual tire systems.
pros: All metal construction, no plastic or rubber to break
Long neck on valve stem for easier access to truck/RV tires
Includes 2 interchangeable heads: straight and 45 degree angle
cons: Turns on and off too easily

customer_reviews.title: Packaging damages gauge
customer_reviews.text: Really is a super nice tire gauge, with a great carrying case - but whats the point if the packaging itself scratches the hell out of the lens on the display before you get it. I thought the first one I got was a return that had been bouncing around in somebodies toolbox for a while so I returned it myself, but the next one had the same issue. Just a simple protective film over the display would fix the issue!
customer_reviews.author: marshal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at half the price.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Ended up buying a gage at a truckstop to check my tires. First, this thing is way to easy to turn off while checking pressures. Or change from psi to bar. Second, you have to hold it on for a second or two to get a reading. Third, even if you hold it on for a slow three count, and make sure you can't hear any air leak, you might do it three times and you'll get three different pressures. Almost gave it two stars because the light is useful to check your tires in the dark. Too bad it is such a pain to use and gives random pressures.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kohn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A high-end unit, solid build. The selection between different measurement unit got in the way. If I short pressed once, it changes from PSI to other unit system. You have to long press instead to avoid the issue. Overall nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Padraic Ley

customer_reviews.title: works as intenedded
customer_reviews.text: Only issue has been at times the unit needs to be zeroed out to receive next reading
customer_reviews.author: Richard Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gauge
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and extremely accurate. I use it on my Motorhome, Jeep and truck!,
customer_reviews.author: Roger Vachon

customer_reviews.title: DIGITAL TIREMINDER TURNS ON WHEN IN CASE. BATTERIES ARE ...
customer_reviews.text: DIGITAL TIREMINDER TURNS ON WHEN IN CASE. BATTERIES ARE ALWAYS DEAD. NEED TO STORE BATTERIES IN CASE OUT OF UNIT WHILE NOT IN USE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and perfect if you have an RV with dual rear tires
customer_reviews.text: Top quality and perfect if you have an RV with dual rear tires. This long next and reverse fill lets getting into tight places a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Kief

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and does what I need. I needed a gage that would work on a Ford DRW setup and it works super. Very well priced and great quality,
customer_reviews.author: Go Vikings

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Costumer service for this was outstanding. For some reason when we changed the battery, it quit working. We wrote them and they sent a new one right away. highly recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Best tire pressure gauge I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I used this a few times now and like the size, sturdiness, and ease of reading. Accuracy will be within 2 psi, and that's ok. The carrying case holds everything in a neat package.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kadzielawski

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Has worked fine over the past year. Seems very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, only wish the extra nozzle was shorter or maybe have a third one that short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great even on hard to reach dual wheeled tires. Nice holster also.
customer_reviews.author: Drewster

customer_reviews.title: Great gauge.
customer_reviews.text: Love the accuracy of the product. Had a little glitch and the company made it right. Impressive service.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gauge, instant read out very well made good quality
customer_reviews.author: N L Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Tire Minder
customer_reviews.text: I used the tire minder to check my RV tires, the unit has worked great. The gauge seams to be very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tarzan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, clear and accurate LED read out. Can be a little difficult to use on a dully.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy to use and seems very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Zeeb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, tried it on my rv and was on point. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK HICKS

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my Sierra 3500 DRW
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my Sierra 3500 DRW. A necessity for checking the pressure on the dual rear wheels. Seems to be very accurate. Came with a nice case too.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: easy to use to get great reading for my RV tires
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Superior product evident as soon as you touch it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Superior product evident as soon as you touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred L. Ordelheide

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have used on my new RV and love the interchangeable stems
customer_reviews.author: TROY L FLEENOR

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Over priced for what it is. Absolutely must remove the batteries or it will discharge. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Frisby

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, accurate and sturdy. I use it everyday in a truck tire shop
customer_reviews.author: G Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Best tire gauge hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for years to find a tire gauge that I feel is accurate. This one has hit the mark 100%
customer_reviews.author: Ron Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and provides an exact reading on a lighted display.
customer_reviews.author: J Norman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the RV. Case is nice to have too.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on cars and semis
customer_reviews.text: Works great on cars and semis. Valve stems are very dirty and I still get accurate results. Can unscrew assembly and blow out unit with air.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Brown

customer_reviews.title: Power button needs a redesign
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of mechanical and digital tire pressure gauges over the years and this one is among the best I've used. I would give it 5⭐️ except I think they should have recessed the power button so that it isn't so easy to accidentally turn on.
customer_reviews.author: JRZ

customer_reviews.title: Mad and Want My Money Back
customer_reviews.text: Got it in mail, opened it up out of the package and tried to open it to put the batteries in, it was so tight it broke off in a second. For the money it costs, it shouldn't have broke.
customer_reviews.author: Rv-er

customer_reviews.title: but believe that I'm going to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems rugged enough, and does the job that it's designed for. I've only used it a few times, but believe that I'm going to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Hill

customer_reviews.title: Works as indicated. No problems. I use this ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as indicated. No problems. I use this specifically for my Class B RV to check the air pressure on the wheels where the stem is on the inside pointing toward the center of the chassis.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

product_meta.title: TireMinder TMG-AAA-RV High Precision Digital Truck and RV Tire Gauge
product_meta.description: The TireMinder High Precision RV Gauge offers an incredibly accurate 1 PSI precision level and premium all metal construction. It features replaceable "AAA" batteries (included), two interchangeable heads (straight and 45°), a bright LED backlight, a "no sweat" custom grip, a front facing flashlight and a 5 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Includes interchangeable heads (straight and 45 degrees), LED backlight display, front-facing flashlight, protective pouch, high-quality all-metal construction and a "no sweat" custom grip.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
